attributes.action: Resign as recognition of his own incompetence in office and lack of personality.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Most educated people in Great Britain would be able to tell you that the state of our economy is a direct result of mis management by Gordon Brown in his former employ as the chancellor. Given that he appears to be taking this incompetence into the Premiership, and that the voting public have spoken already, we must encourage the PM to resign in an attempt to save the position of New Labour as first choice to run our Government at the next general election.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
False or incomplete name or address information
